Name: Your Turn To Die -Death Game By Majority-
About the game: What is 'Your Turn To Die'? Your Turn To Die -Death Game By Majority- is a multi-ending horror adventure game. Your decision will directly affect the story and final outcome! Story Sara Chidouin returns home from school late one night to discover that something's gone terribly wrong. When she comes to, she finds herself, her friend Joe, and 9 other people trapped in a mysterious place. Placed in life-and-death situations, they must come to an agreement about what they should do - and who should die. 1. Explore and interact with the unique characters and find a way to escape from the enclosed space! 2. Based on the role cards you are given, discuss and determine who to vote for! 3. Sometimes, in addition to discussions, they are forced to participate in games of life! Your vote will change the fate of the survivors. Save the weak or save the beneficial, the choice is yours. The upcoming Early Access version is not yet complete main story wise; the first part of chapter 3 is complete. The second part will be added as soon as it is completed! -- Special Thanks -- English Localization: vgperson (Twitter: @KerokeroCoder)
